title: Nepal's harvest season begins
caption: Harvest season begins in Nepal
desc: Today we're in Kathmandu, Nepal, where the Boudhanath stupa stands out against the skyline. A Unesco World Heritage site, the stupa is on the ancient trade route from Tibet - traders have rested and offered prayers here for centuries. Like all stupas, Boudhanath is a mound-like structure containing relics. It was first built sometime after the 600s, when Buddhism was spreading through Tibet and Nepal. It's long been a major pilgrimage site for Buddhists, and is said to entomb the remains of Kassapa Buddha, one of the 29 named ancient Buddhas.
